posts.post_content:
Up for auction are two lower-grade T206s of Hall of Famers:

Bobby Wallace - Card has some creasing and a small rip about 1/4" on the left side, but a presentable front and excellent centering. Some sort of paper has been glued to most of the back. This is a Piedmont, unknown series, Factory 25

[STRIKE]Rube Waddell - Some sort of stain or something on this one. Tiny amount of paper loss in lower left corner also with some light creasing. [/STRIKE] SOLD

Asking $40.00 for Wallace via PPFF.
